kelbourne woolens all rights reserved 3 april hat courtney kelley directions finishing break yarn thread through live stitches 2 3 times and brim fasten_off weave in remaining ends soak in cool water and using smaller ndls co 90 sts join for working in the round wool wash and block to measurements being careful not to twist sts pm indicating beg of round work rnds 1 4 of eyelet ribbing for 1 75 ending after pom pom make a 2 diameter pompom with remaining yarn secure working a round 2 75 sts on ndls after working round 2 pom pom to hat and tie off inside increase for body next round increase *k1tbl k1f+b k1f+b k1 k1f+b repeat from label using sewing thread and a sharp sewing needle sew-on * around 120 sts kelbourne woolens label to brim as shown change to larger ndls body work rnds 1 12
